details.description: Wonderful 5 Bedroom, 6.1 Bath Custom Brick Front Colonial 1.4 AC professionally landscaped property on a quiet cul-de-sac. Sunny and Bright, this home features spacious rooms with a fabulous layout. Family room features a gas FP and is open to the large custom kitchen, complete with SS appliances, dry bar with wine fridge, granite counters and backsplash, center island, sunny eat in area that is open to the family room and steps out to a spacious deck and patio. First floor bedroom and full bath. Second floor Gracious MBR with expansive walk-in closet and luxurious bath. 3 additional bedrooms and 3 full baths complete the second floor. Finished LL, with lounge, rec room, wet bar, exercise room, office and full bath is a fabulous space for all! Great deck and patio and a professionally landscaped yard.

details.description: Light & bright updated Ranch in a quiet neighborhood. Recently painted and in move-in condition. Kitchen has oak cabinets, corner cabinet has glass front, tile floor and all appliances included. Laminate Wood floor throughout. New crown modling and floor in back bedroom. Formal Dining area looks out French doors to the deck, pond and yard. Garage has been converted into a Den/Family Room with gas fireplace. Three bedrooms run along the back of the house. Plenty of storage and closet space. This home is on a level corner lot that is completely fenced in. Neighborhood is situated between Route 27 and Route 1 which makes it accessible to major highways, buses, trains and shopping. The high school is in walking distance. There are plenty of parks, walking/biking trails for outdoor activities.

details.description: Builders/Developers, possible subdivision. Total property size with house 10.64 acres including house that is on 1 acre. Highest and Best Use residential subdivision. No engineering or feasibility study has been done. The property is in Low Density One Acre Residiential District.LD zone permits single-family residences,agriculture, family day care homes,community residences typical accessory uses, and typical conditional uses .Any of the permitted uses is adaptable to the subject except for clustering. Potential of a four-lot major subdivision based on existing frontage and lot size. The site can support a subdivision of up to 10 lots if approvals for utilities and an access road and cul-de-sac are obtained.Land MLS#3213998

Walkout finished basement boasts second kitchen, full service bar area, billiards room, office, wine cellar, steam room, in-law suite with separate entry. Conveniently located to all major highways and direct line transportation to NYC.

details.description: Mint 4 bedroom, 2 and 1/2 bath 10 year young colonial in a lovely community of similar well kept properties. This home is immaculate and in move-in condition. Impressive entry foyer. Large eat-in kitchen with ceramic tiled floor, ample cabinet and counter space, and a pantry. Impressive master bedroom suite has built-in cabinetry, a walk-in closet, large sitting room and full bathroom. Stunning formal dining room with custom ceramic floor. Inviting family room has a fireplace. Exquisite finished basement with custom wet bar, picturesque entertainment area, ceramic tiled floor and a large open space for an exercise room, etc. Tastefully landscaped and manicured property. Fenced yard with a nice size patio. Brick and vinyl siding. Security system and Uniden camera monitoring system. Lawn sprinklers. 5 minutes to Aberdeen/Matawan Train Station and Buses to NYC, North Jersey, and Jersey Shore towns. Near entry to Garden State Parkway and Routes 34, 35, and 36. Great shopping nearby.

details.description: This wonderful, meticulously maintained, truly loved, FIVE bedroom colonial, with all 5 bedrooms upstairs, offers everything a buyer could want in this price point ... The original owner hates to leave ... Hardwood floors throughout (including under the carpets in the home - the floors in living room and dining room were professional refinished after these pictures were taken), a home office, an updated master bath, a fully fenced in back yard with an inground pool and a 7 year old deck, a four year old roof, lots of gardens, a lovely country kitchen, and a gorgeous tree lined neighborhood ...Room sizes approximate... The home itself is in a fantastic location close to the Route 9 commuting, the Freehold Mall, downtown Freehold restaurants and the NJ shore ...This home will not disappoint!

brokerage.brokerage-name: Berkshire Hathaway HomeServices New Jersey Properties

details.description: This home is a wonderful opportunity to own an end unit Townhome that has been meticulously maintained by the current owner for over 20 years ... A very secluded unit with Two deeded spots that can easily fit 3 mid-sized cars, as the cover photo shows, this home is truly a rare find in the Twin Rivers Development ... This split level end unit was also designed with the living room raised up to the level of the main floor, allowing for a full finished basement to be created ... This adds approximately 600 square feet of living space to the 1,670 square feet upstairs that is typical for this model ... Once inside, the home reflects the care given it ... The large eat in kitchen was recently renovated and it features nice tile flooring, newer cabinets, a pantry and beautiful stainless steel appliances which include a gas range that is not typical in this development where many ranges are still electric ... The formal dining room is used by the current owner as an extension of the lovely living room ... Upstairs, the large master bedroom suite has a walk in closet and a gorgeous bath that was recently renovated and the two other bedrooms share a bath that was also renovated ... The house offers a lot of storage with plenty of closet space... There is a sump pump in the basement with a battery back up for peace of mind if power is lost and the new windows have a lifetime warranty... A fenced in courtyard in the back completes this package ... The community itself offers four pools, tennis courts, areas set aside with slides and swings to have fun and is close to the library, NYC commuter buses, and shopping ... the elementary school is in walking distance to the unit ... Please visit soon ... The home is all ready for it's next occupant and is in move in condition ... WOW!!! - Pictures are believing so please view virtual tour ...

details.description: Country living at it's finest! This spectacular custom estate offers well manicured gardens all around, nestled in a beautiful country setting with gorgeous views of beautifully farmed farm land & horse country while sitting on almost 6 lush acres. Built with the finest in quality, this estate home boasts custom cabinetry & moldings throughout. Layed with gleaming maple hardwood floors, exotic stones and marble filled bathrooms. A perfect layout for entertaining w/ a bright, open floor plan. The large fully equipped kitchen has all the bells & whistles! Granite & natural stone countertops, Sub-zero fridge, Wolf stove w/ double ovens, built-in butcher block w/ cold marble slab cut out for baking. Fully capable of hosting a dinner party of any size! Elegance abounds throughout from the inviting study to the stunning dining room to the TWO well appointed master suites and a laundry room that will make you WANT to do laundry! Walk downstairs to a fully finished basement featuring 10ft. ceilings, state of the art movie theater & gym room along w/ full bath. This home is equipped with a high-end automation system featuring multi-room audio, cameras, whole home lighting & thermostat control which is all accessible from your smart phone! Professionally decorated! This exquisite country estate has it ALL! Come see! 5 minutes to turnpike & close to I-95!

details.description: Beautiful custom built brick colonial situated on almost 2 acres located in Millstone Township. 6 Bdrms & 3.5 baths. 3 Entrance ways, 3 balconies, 4 car oversized garage, hard wood floors and custom molding throughout house. Features 2 stone verandas, double story grand foyer w/ imported marble floors & double staircase. 2 story great room w/ a gas fire place and media room. Kitchen is state of the art banquet sized w/viking appliances & huge island. Granite counter tops throughout & custom cabinets and butlers pantry. Downstairs also features 2 mudrooms, laundry room, office/conservatory and 2 bedrooms and full bath. Can be used for in-law suite, au pair suite, mother/daughter suite. Huge master suite w/2nd laundry room. Stone patio, inground pool, paver oversized driveway. MUST SEE!!

details.description: Own a piece of Millstone Twp History! Circa 1850's 19+ Acres, Stunning Farmhouse features 5 very spacious bedrooms. 1 bedroom downstairs and 4 upstairs. Large Foyer, 2 full bathrooms, living room, family room, eat-in kitchen and a beautiful wood floor and decorative wood ceiling in dining room. Master Bedroom has new hard wood floor with a huge master closet. Upstairs features Bathroom/Laundry combo. Enclosed porch in the back of house and large front porch. Numerous out buildings and workshops make the property a one of a kind for the hobby enthusiast, car collector, or craftsman. This home and property and all that it has to offer will not disappoint!

The Newer Kitchen, Newer Hardwoods, and Tile flooring, is just the beginning. The living room features impressive vaulted ceilings bright, open windows that let in tons of natural light. The master suite has his and hers full bathrooms! This home also features a first floor office that is wrapped in windows and its own entry off the rear patio. details.description: Great curb appeal. Zoned for office or retail (General Business District GB-3) and with open floor plan, building is ideal for use by doctors, dentists, lawyers, accountants, financial planners or other service professionals. Other permitted uses include Retail, restaurants, take-out food, physical therapy, yoga, exercise studio, and child care centers. (professional photos to be posted soon)This well-maintained building features open, unobstructed floor plan with 2500 sf on ground floor and large, finished basement (2500 sf), plenty of on-site parking and ideally located on busy road. Big Plus: 12 parking spaces in rear of building and on-street parking out front. The property is located in one of Westfield's vibrant commercial districts and is a 1/2 mile to NJ Transit trains. Basement is spotless and can be used for storage, recreation or meeting space. Expansion to 2 stories above ground may be possible.Current owners successful tax appeal lowered annual property taxes to $11,986. Super clean, solidly built, in excellent location, with on-site parking, and reduced taxes equals great opportunity.

Garage access to main level leads to inviting designer kit w/gorgeous cabinetry, island, granite & SS appl. Two fireplaces, gleaming hardwood floors & custom moldings add great appeal. details.description: Lovely three step ranch on over 1/2 an acre in Murray Hill. Only 0.4 mile from the Murray Hill Train Station to NYC. New gourmet eat in kitchen (2014) with Silestone quartz counters, light gray cabinets, stainless steel appliances and subway tiled backsplash. Master Suite has three large closets (one is a walk in) & renovated master bathroom. Ideal floorplan has spacious living room with wood burning fireplace, formal dining room, eat in kitchen, family room (with gas fireplace). Three spacious bedrooms and two full baths round out the first level. The lower level is a walk out basement with finished rec room, full bathroom, laundry, storage room and oversized two car garage. Enjoy the wooded backyard from the lovely patio. New Providence is a community with a highly ranked public school system and 2 train stations with direct service to NYC. Newark Airport is only 17 miles away

details.description: Elegant Center Hall Colonial in coveted Berwyck Chase Estates with exclusive access to Community Pool and Tennis Courts. This stately home lends itself to both formal entertaining and casual living. The grand 2-story Entrance Foyer with marble floors opens to the Formal Living & DIning Rooms. The Eat-In Chef's Kitchen features a breakfast area, granite counters, stainless appliances, and adjoins a Butler's Pantry. The kitchen opens to the Family Room with a wood-burning fireplace as its focal point and sliders leading to the Deck. Upstairs, the expansive Master Suite features a sitting area, walk-in closets and Master Bathroom. There are 3 additional Bedrooms and 2 additional Full Baths. A sunlit Office/Loft completes this level. Basement & Attic are both finished, offering additional recreation space.

details.description: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Welcome to this appealing Summit Colonial residence.&nbsp; Situated on a level lot with wooded borders, this classic home features a great floor plan with many updates.&nbsp; As you enter, the lovely hardwood floors grace the Foyer, comfortable Living Room & formal Dining Room.&nbsp; The Living Room has a woodburning fireplace, crown molding, recessed lighting & French door leading to a spacious deck.&nbsp; A built-in corner cabinet & chair rail accents the Dining Room.&nbsp; The renovated Eat-in Kitchen boasts cherry cabinets, granite countertops, tile flooring & new stainless steel appliances.&nbsp; An updated Powder Room and the Screened-in Porch complete this level.&nbsp; Upstairs you will find an inviting Master Bedroom, two additional Bedrooms, an updated Full Bath, recessed lighting & hardwood floors.&nbsp; The lower level is finished with a Recreation Room, Office, Laundry Room, & recessed & track lighting.&nbsp; The attached garage, accessible from the Recreation Room allows easy access to the yard.&nbsp;

details.description: Breathtaking sunsets and affordable luxury are yours at Marina Bay Club. This meticulous, 3-level, end-unit townhouse offers tremendous space and amenities. The direct waterfront location is ideal with spectacular views of the Marina and Pleasure Bay from most every room, including the combined space of the living and dining rooms, with fireplace and full-view door. Bonus features include enclosed lanai with vaulted ceilings and skylights, and bright eat-in kitchen, both with sliding doors to the spacious patio. Both 3rd floor bedrooms are en-suite with full attached baths plus the first floor configuration provides a living quarters unto itself. Professionally finished garage adds to the appeal. Don't miss the opportunity to invest in this coveted lifestyle on the Shrewsbury River!

details.description: A feeling of living in a mountainous-like setting off a private lane can be yours in Oak Hill. This classic and well-designed center hall colonial is located at the pinnacle of this beautiful parcel of land and nestled among the treetops of this exclusive neighborhood. The living room offers wonderful views and a brick fireplace to enjoy on a chilly evening. The eat-in kitchen has been updated with new appliances and flows into the family featuring a parquet floor and built-ins, both rooms overlooking the expansive stone patio. Gorgeous, new upper level bathrooms add to the appeal. You will enjoy a feeling of seclusion and serenity while being just minutes from schools, shopping, major roadways and public transportation. All the fantastic details are available in the linked narrative.

details.description: Magnificent Custom built Spacious Colonial w elegant architectural features throughout, exquisite woodwork, imported marble, high ceilings, plenty of natural sun-filled rooms sure to delight. Totally custom & nothing to spare went into this one of a kind 6700 sq ft home starting with amazing stone railings & double front door lead into a two story marble foyer, gourmet kitchen with granite counter tops, custom cabinets, front and rear staircase, beautiful hard wood floors, first floor conservatory, dining room with wet bar, and first floor office. Master bedroom with sitting area plus an amazing bathroom with jetted tub, double stall and jetted shower, his and her granite sinks, dressing room leading to the walkin California closet & tray ceilings. Home is extremely well cared for & it's a must see!

details.description: Great opportunity to live in a beautiful development! This beautiful 12 room home has been tastefully decorated and has so much to offer from the open floor plan to the media room! Must see! Upgraded kitchen with granite counter tops and upgraded ss appliances, first floor office and amazing conservatory, gleaming hard wood floors, wains-coating, beautiful molding, beautifully finished basement with stadium seating media room & surround sound, plenty of additional space for a play area and a half bath. Ceiling to floor all stone gas fireplace, beautiful colors, spacious rooms, large master suite with huge walk in closet. This house has been so well taken care of and added so many personal touches, it will be a gift for the right buyer. The 36 home upper class neighborhood is the retreat you need!

details.description: Come visit this inviting 4 bedroom cape with so much to offer! From an updated kitchen to an enormous back yard, this house is sure to please. Updated baths, fenced in yard, hard wood floors & more! Great entry way as this beautiful foyer leads into a spacious living room with hard wood floors under carpet, kitchen has maple cabinets, corian counter tops, updated back splash and newer appliances. First floor has a bedroom and a half updated bath. Sliders to a new deck that was replaced to professionally have the oil tank removed. New upgraded tank is now in partially finished basement with rec room. 2nd floor has three bedrooms and one very large and updated bath with walk in closet. Level lot, all fenced in, perfect for entertaining. Located a block from the golf course in a neighborhood setting.

details.description: Build your dream home with beautiful views! This land is already approved and ready to go! Foundation is up! Come take over and choose one of the sellers plans or use your own plans. Building permit is obtained, nothing left to do but build. build your 3 bedroom with office here! Foundation is already in, lot is cleared, septic is approved for 3 bedrooms with office, water & utilities are in the street. Builder has built the house right below this foundation and that is the same house that was planned to go on this foundation so you can already see the finished product. Beautiful view from up top of the driveway. Must walk up to appreciate.

Gorg. kitchen with granite S/S appliances and loads of counter space. Fml DR, huge living room and laundry room all on one level. Stairway leads to 3 bright and sunny bedrooms and 2 full baths. details.description: Meticulously maintained 4 bedroom/3.5 bath home on lovely street. Eat-in Kit & Fam Rm have glass doors to decks overlooking beautiful backyard. Kit has brand new GE oven, sub zero refrig. Lrg formal Liv Rm & Din Rm (with dish closet). Fam Rm w/ wood burning fireplace & built in bar. Hardwood floors throughout (even under carpet). Master bedroom w/walk in closet, master bath with jetted tub, shower stall & cabinet w/TV facing tub. Fin basement w/rec room, exercise area & office w/ full bath attached. HW heater 7/2014. Plenty of closets & built-ins for storage. Sprinkler & alarm system.

brokerage.brokerage-name: Berkshire Hathaway HomeServices New Jersey Properties

details.description: Wow! Rarely does a home of this size and quality become available in Verona. This 5 bedroom, home has 3 new baths, custom kitchen and grand scale rooms,yet still has a warm, intimate feel. Every detail has been designed and meticulously cared for by the original owners. All of the fixtures, appliances and materials are of the highest quality and integrity. The large foyer sets the tone with marble floors, custom woodwork and a grand circular staircase. Any chef would be delighted with the center island kitchen. Only high-end appliances are allowed, The eating area has sliding doors that open to large deck and fabulous yard. The master suite is a dream with 2 large walk in closets and the brand new master bath is an oasis with a jetted soaking tub, double marble sink and custom stall shower.

brokerage.brokerage-name: Berkshire Hathaway HomeServices New Jersey Properties

details.description: Spacious home located on quiet Cul-De-Sac steps away from North End School. Tiled entryway welcomes you into this warm home. The ground level has a large family room with entrance to the over-sized garage. There is also a large bedroom, laundry room and full bath on the ground level that could be suitable for a nanny or in-law suite, with a separate outside entrance. The main living area is open and has a large bay window, crown molding and an updated kitchen with granite counters. All 3 bedrooms on the 2nd floor have fabulous closet space and hardwood floors. There are 2 full attics and a whole house fan. There are many added details that set this home apart from the rest. It has been lovingly cared for over the years. The yard is large and private with a patio. low taxes and excellent schools.

details.description: Beautiful colonial with new kitchen. 3 bedrooms plus a nursery and full finished basement. Large living room with fireplace opens to sunny den. Great yard is deceptively large. Ready to move in. This charming colonial needs nothing except new owners to fall in love with it. The kitchen is new and opened to formal dining room. Sliding doors to deck and fenced yard. The living room is large and has a fireplace and leads to a great den. The second floor has an updated bath, 2 bedrooms and a nursery. The 3rd floor is a fun bedroom with high ceiling, room to run around and have adventures. The finished basement with full bath is great added living space and is freshly carpeted. All this and beautifully decorated, you won't even need to bring your paint brush. The location has easy access to Route 280.

details.description: Wow! This is it! Charming Colonial with large sunny rooms. Lovingly maintained by owner for over 60 years. New hardwood floors and natural wood moldings throughout the home. LOW TAXES!! The first floor has an open floor plan with large living room, sun room, extra large dining room and kitchen that opens to a deck overlooking the level backyard. There is a large pantry in the kitchen that is screaming to be a powder room. Most of the floors have been replaces and leveled. There are 3 bedrooms on the 2nd floor with excellent closet space. The lower level has a laundry room, recreation room and is a full walk out to the patio. Located in the Laning Avenue School district, one of Verona's Star Schools. Close to NYC transportation, beautiful Verona Park and all Verona has to offer.

details.description: Perfection! Classic center hall colonial with beautiful views from every room. Elegant and sophisticated. The 1st floor has a great floor plan with each room connecting to the next. Living room and family room are surrounded by windows. The formal dining room has custom wood work and opens to the chef's kitchen with granite counters, center island and stainless appliances. The focal point of the kitchen is the custom brick fireplace that can make the chilliest nights feel cozy. The 2nd floor has 4 true bedrooms, all with great closet space. The hall bath has 2 marble vanities and deep tub. The master bedroom has a custom walk in closet plus an additional double door closet. The ground level is the cherry on top! A full walk out level with a large rec room and separate office space,

brokerage.brokerage-name: Berkshire Hathaway HomeServices New Jersey Properties

details.description: Rare opportunity! Great 2 bedroom townhouse located in the heart of West Caldwell tucked in the back of Parkview Condominiums, away from the traffic and noise. 3 floors of living space. Best location in the community under archway, protected from any weather. The 1st floor has a kitchen with breakfast bar, and lovely open living room/dining room space. There is also a powder room and coat closet. There are sliding doors to the private patio. The 2nd floor has 2 en~suite bathrooms, plus pull-down stairs to an attic.The lower level has a laundry and storage room, plus an office. The unit comes with a deeded garage and an assigned parking space. There is guest parking along the split rail fence o the exit driveway and additional parking is available on Bloomfield Ave. Perfect Location!!

details.description: Perfect location and possibilities galore! This ranch home has large, sunny rooms with a great floor plan. Family room opens to large eat~in kitchen with picture window overlooking patio and yard. Everything you are looking for! The foyer welcomes you and separates to living space from the bedrooms. The large living room opens to the dining room and has a brick fireplace as the focal point of the room. The 3 large bedrooms, all have ample closet space. Master bedroom has 2 closets and a master bath. There are hardwood floors under the carpets that can easily match the floors in the foyer and hallway. The basement is a great surprise. So many possibilities! It is a true walk out with a large rec room, powder room, laundry room, office, and several storage spaces. Forest Avenue School. GREAT OPPORTUNITY.

details.description: Location! Location! Location! Custom-built home in one of Clark's finest areas! 4BR, 2 1/2 bath, ranch-type home boasts large rooms, premium windows/doors thru-out, cherry HW floors, & central air. Great floor plan for entertaining! Family room with wood-burning fireplace to keep cozy in winter. Florida room, in-ground pool & patio for your summer enjoyment. Lushly landscaped grounds, paver-block driveway, situated on a private, 100 X 150 corner lot.

Great home for first-time buyer, commuter, airport worker, etc.
